Authors:
HL Li , Ruvishika Shehali Jayawardena, Wu Xu, M Hu,
XingHong Li, JH Liu, Kevin D Hyde, JiYe Yan
Title:
New Records of Lasiodiplodia species on Camellia sinensis
causing leaf necrosis in Fujian of China
Keywords:
Botryosphaeriaceae,Camellia sinensis, leaf necrosis, new
record
Abstract:
A leaf necrosis was observed on Camellia sinensis in
Fujian Province, China, during 2015. Based on morphological
characteristics and combined analysis of ITS and tef sequence data the
pathogens was identified as Lasiodiplodia theobromae and L.
pseudotheobromae. This is the first report of L. theobromae and L.
pseudotheobromae causing leaf necrosis on Camellia sinensis.

trees.title: Lasiodiplodia species on Camellia sinensis MP
